com.htsmart.wristband.connector

Interface ConnectorListener


  • public interface ConnectorListener
    Wristband connection state callback.

      • FAILED_ILLEGAL_DEVICE

        static final int FAILED_ILLEGAL_DEVICE
        Illegal device. When the Bluetooth connection is successful, the matching service and the characteristic are failed, or the Notify fails to open, which is considered an illegal device.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        void onConnect(WristbandConfig config)
        Connect successfully.
        Parameters:
        config - Wristband all config.

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect(boolean isCloseActive,
                  boolean reconnect)
        Disconnected.
        Parameters:
        isCloseActive - True for active disconnect, false for passive disconnect.
        reconnect - Whether the internal is re connected. This value is only valid when isCloseActive==false.

      • onConnectFailed

        void onConnectFailed(int failedCode)
        Connect failed.
        Parameters:
        failedCode - Failed reason.The reasons for failure are divided into two types: Bluetooth error and logical error.

        Bluetooth error.When the connection fails, it will continue to try to connect. If you do not need to continue to re connect, you need call IDeviceConnector.close(). FAILED_UNSTABLE_ERROR FAILED_CONNECT_ERROR FAILED_SERVICES_ERROR

        Logical error.When the connection fails, will not continue to try to connect. FAILED_BIND FAILED_LOGIN FAILED_GET_CONFIG
